title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 23, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 23, 2020
description:
On today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, the Lakers dropped Game 3 on the Western Conference Finals, should Lakers fans be worried? We're joined by NBC Sports' Mike Florio, Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix and Former NFL QB David Carr join the show. Plus, DP pays tribute to the late Gale Sayers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
